mapper.select: SELECT * FROM Board ORDER BY boardNo DESC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO Board (boardNo, nickName, userNo, title, boardContent, createAt, b_readhit, updateAt) VALUES (board_no_seq.NEXTVAL, #{nickName}, #{userNo}, #{title}, #{boardContent}, CURRENT_TIMESTAMP, 0, #{updateAt, jdbcType=TIMESTAMP})
mapper.update: UPDATE Board SET title = #{title}, boardContent = #{boardContent}, updateAt = CURRENT_TIMESTAMP WHERE boardNo = #{boardNo}
